sentence: He could absolutely lose,? said Michele Woodhouse, one of seven Republicans challenging Mr. Cawthorn in the primary.
title: Pressure Mounts on Cawthorn as Scandals Pile Up

sentence: I think these last few videos and pictures have been, for many people here, has just been the final straw,? said primary opponent Michele Woodhouse, a longtime Republican activist in the Western North Carolina district.
author: Emily Brooks
title: Cawthorn ramps up defense as crass videos add to mountain of bad press
